snippet: Mr. Borge, the last surviving founder of the Sandinista rebel group that toppled Nicaragua’s dictatorship in 1979, went from student radical to one of the leading officials of his nation’s government.
abstract: Tomas Borge Martinez, founder of Sandinista rebel group that toppled Nicaragua's dictatorship in 1979 and former interior minister in the revolutionary government, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Borge, the last surviving founder of the Sandinista rebel group that toppled Nicaragua’s dictatorship in 1979, went from student radical to one of the leading officials of his nation’s government.

headline.seo: Tomás Borge Martínez, Sandinista Rebel, Dies at 81
headline.main: Tomás Borge Martínez, Sandinista Rebel and Nicaragua Interior Minister, Dies at 81
headline.print_headline: Tomás Borge Martínez, Sandinista Rebel And Nicaragua Interior Minister, Dies at 81
